item.title: [PI] 99slayer req
item.dc:creator: @intdubpk intdubpk
item.description:
@intdubpk wrote:

try to change that getlevelexp(18) thing to this,

if (c.playerLevel[c.playerSlayer] >= 99) {

from this

if(!c.getItems ().playerHasItem(995, 500000000) && player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(18) >= 99) {

To

if(!c.getItems ().playerHasItem(995, 500000000) && c.playerLevel[playerSlayer] >= 99 {

Your best bet is just to set a level standard on the skillcape and leave that part alone. that way any1 can buy but only lvl 99 can wear

item.title: [PI] 99slayer req
item.dc:creator: @dgk_all_day1 dgk_all_day
item.description:
@dgk_all_day1 wrote:

im trying to do this, the part that checks if player has the right amount of money and amount works fine. bUT I cant work out how to do then 2nd part that checks if the player has 99 slayer?

} else if (c.dialogueAction == 125) { if(!c.getItems ().playerHasItem(995, 500000000) && player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(18) >= 99) { c.sendMessage("you need 500m gp and 99 slayer to buy this item."); c.getPA().removeAllWindows(); break; } c.getItems().addItem(15051,1); c.getItems().deleteItem(995, c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 500000000);

but for this part below the first bit that checks for item works, but how would the 2nd part be done?so that you must be 99 slayer as well?

(!c.getItems ().playerHasItem(995, 500000000) && player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(18) >= 99)

i get errors for this ^

&& player.getSkills().getLevelForExperience(18) >= 99)

how is this done to check if player has 99 slayer?

Read full topic
